abstract: The anger was evident at Citigroup’s annual meeting, where all nominated directors were elected but shareholders took turns at the microphone to object to how the bank had been operating.
lead_paragraph: The anger was evident at Citigroup’s annual meeting, where all nominated directors were elected but shareholders took turns at the microphone to object to how the bank had been operating.

headline.main: Angry Words From Investors at Citigroup Meeting
